original_text: Hello, my name is John Mathis. Nice to meet you. 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, blue, green, red, dog, cat, cow, bird. Thank you and goodbye.

english.translated_text: Hello, my name is John Mathis. Nice to meet you. 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, blue, green, red, dog, cat, cow, bird. Thank you and goodbye.
english.romanization_method: NONE - Do not apply any romanization method. Retain the original script.

spanish.translated_text: Hola, me llamo John Mathis. Encantado de conocerte. 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, azul, verde, rojo, perro, gato, vaca, pájaro. Gracias y adiós.
spanish.romanization_method: NONE - Do not apply any romanization method. Retain the original script.

chinese.translated_text: 你好，我的名字是约翰·马蒂斯。很高兴认识你。1，2，3，4，5，蓝色，绿色，红色，狗，猫，牛，鸟。谢谢，再见。
chinese.romanization_method: PINYIN - Convert the text from Simplified Chinese to Pinyin, including tone markers. Maintain accuracy in reflecting the original Mandarin pronunciation.
chinese.romanized_text: Nǐ hǎo, wǒ de míngzì shì Yuēhàn·Mǎtísī. Hěn gāoxìng rènshi nǐ. 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, lán sè, lǜ sè, hóng sè, gǒu, māo, niú, niǎo. Xièxiè, zàijiàn.

arabic.translated_text: مرحبا، اسمي جون ماثيس. سعيد بلقائك. 1، 2، 3، 4، 5، أزرق، أخضر، أحمر، كلب، قط، بقرة، طائر. شكرا ووداعا.
arabic.romanization_method: ALA-LC -  Use the American Library Association — Library of Congress (ALA-LC) romanization system for Arabic. Utilize full UTF-8 characters for diacritics and special characters to ensure precise representation. Adhere to standardized conventions for transliterating non-Latin scripts.
arabic.romanized_text: Marḥabā, ismī Jūn Māthīs. Saʿīd bilqā'ika. 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, azul, akhḍar, aḥmar, kalb, qiṭṭ, baqara, ṭā'ir. Shukran wa wadāʿan.
